text: apage paramadhipatiyaneni! numba firavunta ha ohuge pradhanin hata numbage margayen ovun nomanga yanu pinisa melova jivitaye vastuva ha alamkaraya pirinæmuvehiya. apage paramadhipatiyaneni! ovunge vastuva vinasa karanu. tavada ovunge hadavat bænda damanu. ovun ema vedaniya danduvama dakina turu visvasa nokaranu æta
